										Alloy								</h3>
								<div class="intro">
									<p>Alloy helps top banks and fintechs make better decisions using a single API and dashboard to manage Know Your customer (KYC), Anti-Money Laundering (AML), fraud, and more.</p>
								</div>
									<div class="ctas">
										<a class="cta button white" href="https://alloy.co/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Visit Website</a>

					<article class="box investment with-overlay-on-open" id="portfolio-company-21" data-roadmaps="219,202,204" data-name="archy">
						<div class="max-width">
							<div class="company">
								<h3 class="h-module-h3 name"><a href="https://www.bvp.com/companies/archy" class="name click-to-open">Archy</a></h3>							</div>
								<div class="main-meta">
												<span class="roadmap">Enterprise</span>
													<a class="roadmap" href="/companies?filter=portfolio-roadmap&value=fintech#portfolio" data-target-on-click="#portfolio" data-filter-on-click="portfolio-roadmap" data-filter-value-on-click="fintech">Fintech</a>
													<a class="roadmap" href="/companies?filter=portfolio-roadmap&value=vertical-software#portfolio" data-target-on-click="#portfolio" data-filter-on-click="portfolio-roadmap" data-filter-value-on-click="vertical-software">Vertical Software</a>
								</div>
						</div>
						<div class="details company opens-in-page-overlay display-as-in-overlay">
							<a href="#close" class="close-button"><span class="screen-reader">Close Info Window</span></a>
							<div class="content">
								<h3 class="h-module-h3">
										Archy								</h3>
								<div class="intro">
									<p>Archy is the all-in-one platform that powers entire dental businesses - practice management, imaging, payment processing, patient engagement, team management, and more.</p>
								</div>

					<article class="box investment with-overlay-on-open" id="portfolio-company-35" data-roadmaps="197,202" data-name="betterment">
						<div class="max-width">
							<div class="company">
								<h3 class="h-module-h3 name"><a href="https://www.bvp.com/companies/betterment" class="name click-to-open">Betterment</a></h3>							</div>
								<div class="main-meta">
												<a class="roadmap" href="/companies?filter=portfolio-roadmap&value=fintech#portfolio" data-target-on-click="#portfolio" data-filter-on-click="portfolio-roadmap" data-filter-value-on-click="fintech">Fintech</a>
													<a class="roadmap" href="/consumer">Consumer</a>
								</div>
						</div>
						<div class="details company opens-in-page-overlay display-as-in-overlay">
							<a href="#close" class="close-button"><span class="screen-reader">Close Info Window</span></a>
							<div class="content">
								<h3 class="h-module-h3">
										Betterment								</h3>
								<div class="intro">
									<p>Betterment is a goal-based online investment company, delivering personalized financial advice paired with low fees and customer experience.</p>

					<article class="box investment with-overlay-on-open" id="portfolio-company-181" data-roadmaps="198,219" data-name="kenna security">
						<div class="max-width">
							<div class="company">
								<h3 class="h-module-h3 name with-enduring"><a href="https://www.bvp.com/companies/kenna-security" class="name click-to-open">Kenna Security</a></h3>
									<div class="enduring-text">ACQUIRED BY: CISCO</div>							</div>
								<div class="main-meta">
													<a class="roadmap" href="/companies?filter=portfolio-roadmap&value=cybersecurity#portfolio" data-target-on-click="#portfolio" data-filter-on-click="portfolio-roadmap" data-filter-value-on-click="cybersecurity">Cybersecurity</a>
													<span class="roadmap">Enterprise</span>
								</div>
						</div>
						<div class="details company opens-in-page-overlay display-as-in-overlay">
							<a href="#close" class="close-button"><span class="screen-reader">Close Info Window</span></a>
							<div class="content">
								<h3 class="h-module-h3">
										Kenna Security								</h3>
								<div class="intro">
									<p>Kenna Security provides risk vulnerability management through its cloud based security platform. Kenna Security was acquired by Cisco in May 2021.</p>
								</div>

								<h3 class="h-module-h3">
										Mindbody								</h3>
								<div class="intro">
									<p>Mindbody is a business management software for yoga and pilates studios, fitness facilities, spas, salons, and other retail clients.</p>
<p>In June 2015, Mindbody went public (NASDAQ: MB).</p>
<p>After four years as a public company, MindBody went private in 2019 when it was acquired by Vista Equity Partners for $2 billion.</p>
								</div>
									<div class="enduring">ACQUIRED BY: VISTA EQUITY PARTNERS</div>

					<article class="box investment with-overlay-on-open" id="portfolio-company-228" data-roadmaps="198,219" data-name="netography">
						<div class="max-width">
							<div class="company">
								<h3 class="h-module-h3 name"><a href="https://www.bvp.com/companies/netography" class="name click-to-open">Netography</a></h3>							</div>
								<div class="main-meta">
													<a class="roadmap" href="/companies?filter=portfolio-roadmap&value=cybersecurity#portfolio" data-target-on-click="#portfolio" data-filter-on-click="portfolio-roadmap" data-filter-value-on-click="cybersecurity">Cybersecurity</a>

							<div class="content">
								<h3 class="h-module-h3">
										Netography								</h3>
								<div class="intro">
									<p>Netography is a network security platform intended to detect and block malicious traffic to defend networks.</p>
								</div>
									<div class="ctas">
										<a class="cta button white" href="https://netography.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Visit Website</a>

											</div>

											</div>

					<article class="box investment with-overlay-on-open" id="portfolio-company-337" data-roadmaps="202" data-name="spruce">
						<div class="max-width">
							<div class="company">
								<h3 class="h-module-h3 name with-enduring"><a href="https://www.bvp.com/companies/spruce" class="name click-to-open">Spruce</a></h3>
									<div class="enduring-text">ACQUIRED BY: ZILLOW</div>							</div>
								<div class="main-meta">
													<a class="roadmap" href="/companies?filter=portfolio-roadmap&value=fintech#portfolio" data-target-on-click="#portfolio" data-filter-on-click="portfolio-roadmap" data-filter-value-on-click="fintech">Fintech</a>
								</div>
						</div>
						<div class="details company opens-in-page-overlay display-as-in-overlay">
							<a href="#close" class="close-button"><span class="screen-reader">Close Info Window</span></a>
							<div class="content">
								<h3 class="h-module-h3">
										Spruce								</h3>
								<div class="intro">
									<p>Spruce aims to improve title insurance assessment and issuance to reduce the time needed to close a real estate deal. Zillow Group acquired Spruce in September 2023.</p>
								</div>
									<div class="enduring">ACQUIRED BY: ZILLOW</div>
									<div class="meta overline sub-count-3 with-roadmaps">

Frontline security professionals use Torq's easy workflow designer, limitless integrations and pre-built templates to deliver stronger security in minutes. Teams use Torq to accelerate threat response, automatically remediate risks, and automate away manual security tasks.</p>

										Verastem								</h3>
								<div class="intro">
									<p>Verastem is a biopharmaceutical company focused on discovering and developing novel drugs that selectively target cancer stem cells. In January 2012, Verastem went public (NASDAQ: VSTM).</p>

												<a class="roadmap" href="/companies?filter=portfolio-roadmap&value=vertical-software#portfolio" data-target-on-click="#portfolio" data-filter-on-click="portfolio-roadmap" data-filter-value-on-click="vertical-software">Vertical Software</a>

								<div class="intro">
									<p>Zenskar is a billing software for SaaS companies to easily manage their business. Zenskar specializes in complex pricing and handling contracts seamlessly, usage data metering, automated revenue accounting, viewing KPIs, and setting up dunning workflows, enabling companies to keep track of sales and payments received, and manage cash effectively.</p>
